author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review (with Max)
review:
Tungster is the third of the Series 5 Mixels of the Lixers Tribe. He has a big wide tongue, and mini wings.

For me, this guy is just that, the tongue and the wings - the rest of him just doesn't do anything for me.

Parts is really what this guy is for me: 4 ball&socket joints, and pieces in yellow/orange, yellow and red.

Quick build time just over 3 minutes.

Like this whole tribe, he's somewhat lack lustre. He's probably my least favourite of all the Series 3-5 Mixels. (I missed series 1 & much of 2)

Lixer Max

This Max (a combination of the 3 members of the tribe) is most like Spugg with Turg's tongue and Tungster's wings. I quite like the balance of the front legs being closer together than the back legs - otherwise it doesn't seem to have enough character of its own.

Quick build time 7 minutes, and there were a lot of parts left over which I find rather disappointing.
